txt.en:
Ugrukhôr,

The tunnels are still crawling with spiders, and the spider-folk seek them out. Half, or more than half, are slain by the very creatures they worship. The passage is not safe, but my boys have not seen any sign of Her, not since we came down this way. We did not venture very deeply inside, and saw no sign of any but spider-folk making the attempt. If Gothmog has found a weapon to use against the spider-folk and their mistress, he keeps it to himself in his tower.

I will send this report back to you with a runner. None of us want to stay here any longer.
